stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements regarding the phrases is correct?

features.html: The following question is based on an excerpt of music for piano that will be played. The excerpt comprises two phrases.

choicesHtml: They form a parallel period, because both phrases begin the same and end with inconclusive cadences.
They form a contrasting period, because the two phrases begin differently and end the same.
They do not form a period, because both phrases end with inconclusive cadences.
They do not form a period, because the first phrase ends with a conclusive cadence and the second phrase ends with an inconclusive cadence.
